item.title: Parking spaces inappropriately coned off, 7th November
item.description:
For the last 8 months these spaces have been illegally coned off by the builders carrying out works on the property next to them. At no point have they tried to suspend the parking bays . They seem to believe they are within their rights to do this

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northchurch Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: Rubbish dumped outside 49 Aylesford Street, 7th November
item.description:
One white rubbish bag that has been left out on a non-bin collection day. This happens a lot on the street and would be good to remind residents to stop putting rubbish out on the wrong days as foxes tear the bags and rubbish goes all over the street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aylesford Street, Pimlico, London

item.title: Poor pedestrian access to footpath, 7th November
item.description:
This overgrowth is constantly hanging over into the footpath. People with mobility issues, people with prams, elderly people, those in wheelchairs will not be able to walk on this path, the boroughs mobility strategy is failing. Please can somebody even out this path and cut back the trees hanging into the pathway obstructing mobility?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palace Gardens, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Hedge on the highway - needs pruning, damage, other
